description: Enterprise techniques used by S-Type, ATT&CK software S0085 v1.1
name: S-Type (S0085)

techniques.comment: [S-Type](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0085) runs the command net user on a victim. [S-Type](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0085) also runs tests to determine the privilege level of the compromised user.(Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)
[S-Type](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0085) uses HTTP for C2.(Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)

[S-Type](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0085) may create a .lnk file to itself that is saved in the Start menu folder. It may also create the Registry key HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run\ IMJPMIJ8.1{3 characters of Unique Identifier}.(Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)

[S-Type](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0085) may create the file %HOMEPATH%\Start Menu\Programs\Startup\Realtek {Unique Identifier}.lnk, which points to the malicious msdtc.exe file already created in the %CommonFiles% directory.(Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)

[S-Type](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0085) may create a temporary user on the system named “Lost_{Unique Identifier}” with the password “pond~!@6”{Unique Identifier}.”(Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)
[S-Type](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0085) uses Base64 encoding for C2 traffic.(Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)
[S-Type](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0085) primarily uses port 80 for C2, but falls back to ports 443 or 8080 if initial communication fails.(Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)

[S-Type](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0085) may save itself as a file named msdtc.exe, which is also the name of the legitimate Microsoft Distributed Transaction Coordinator service binary.(Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)(Citation: Microsoft DTC)
The initial beacon packet for [S-Type](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0085) contains the operating system version and file system of the victim.(Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)
[S-Type](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0085) runs the command net start on a victim.(Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)
